job_title: District Sales Manager, Prisma Cloud, ASEAN
job_desc:
Company Description

Our Mission

At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:

Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.

We have the vision of a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. These aren’t easy goals to accomplish – but we’re not here for easy. We’re here for better. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are

Disruption is at the core of our technology and on our way of work to meet the needs of our employees now and in the future through FLEXWORK, our approach to how we work. We’re changing the nature of work from benefits to learning, location to leadership, we’ve rethought and recreated every aspect of the employee experience at Palo Alto Networks. And because it FLEXes around each individual employee based on their individual choices, employees are empowered to push boundaries and help us all evolve, together.

Job Description

Your Career

As a member of the sales leadership team, you will build, grow and develop a high performing team of cloud security sales professionals. Reporting to the regional VP of Prisma Cloud sales, you'll be charged with all aspects of growing the Prisma Cloud business. This requires an ability to leverage your knowledge of the market, develop and execute a strategy for your region, and partner with cross-functional teams such as product marketing and sales operations. This is not your typical sales leadership role; Prisma Cloud operates as a startup within a larger company, and you'll be joining a critical moment in our growth journey.

Palo Alto Networks has brought technology to the market that is reshaping the public cloud security industry. Our ability to secure the cloud is limited only by our ability to establish relationships with partners and potential customers and help them understand how our products can protect their cloud environments. This is where our sales teams come in; they work together with large organizations to keep their employees, data and operations secure. Our passionate sales teams educate, inspire, and empower their clients and partners to out pace cyber threats.

As part of our sales team, you are empowered with unmatched systems and tools, constantly updated research and sales libraries, and a team built on joint success. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our sales team, you are driven by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfilment in working with clients to resolve incredibly complex cyberthreats. You’re an amazing salesperson – you’re just looking for something more substantial and challenging as your next step.

Your Impact
Grow the Prisma Cloud business across the ASEAN regionBuild, develop and lead a high performing team of sales repsParticipate in quarterly review sessions with the key partners in the regionHave direct involvement and influence in top opportunities with strategic accounts
Qualifications

Your Experience

job_title: SEA Business Applications Solutions Area Lead
job_desc:
Job Description

As the Business Applications Solution Area Lead for our Southeast Asia region, you will be responsible for the overall strategy, performance and growth of Business Applications. You’ll develop the solution area business strategy, including oversight and delivery against sales and financial performance measures. In partnership with regional executives and the Area Solution Area Lead, you’ll strategize future offering investments to grow the business using the Microsoft Ecosystem.

Collaborate with business development teams and peer Solution Area Leads to drive offerings to target clients, including all stages of the deal pursuit, review and approval. Lead solution planning and design efforts across teams and workstreams to deliver value for clients, ensuring client satisfaction. Partner with executive level clients, ensuring they receive required engagement value and supporting future sales pipeline.

Manage the quality delivery of solutions to clients; meeting company and client financial expectations, mitigating future and resolving present quality and client delivery issues.

In this role, you will manage full-spectrum solutions delivery for clients. You will partner with Talent Community Lead and Regional Capability Lead on hiring, staffing, and resourcing skills needed for utilization and chargeability targets.

About You

You are a well-rounded consulting services professional. You understand the industry, the client perspective, the technology, the commercials, and the market. You are a great client communicator and mentor and leader to your team. You are comfortable in all client situations - a consulting pro.

Your skills, knowledge and experience encompass the below:

 Extensive relevant technology business leadership experience, including solution sales, delivery and business management ideally within a consultancy organization  5 years of people leadership particularly.  Experience delivering large/complex CRM (or ERP) solutions within medium & large organizations.  Sound knowledge of Microsoft applications (D365).  Experience with sales principles and practices, including business development, marketing, and complex channel management.  Ability to team with peers in a large, matrixed organizations, including experience with offshore teams and delivery.  Experience delivering solutions for client organizations through complex solutions / projects with heavy client interaction.  Strong consulting / project-based background, including assessing and leading the opportunity and risk associated with large scale, complex projects.  Bachelor's degree in Business or technology-related field, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.  About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 56,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

job_title: Associate AWS Specialist Solutions Architect AWS (Level 4), WWSO
job_desc:
Job Summary

DESCRIPTION

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a subsidiary of Amazon.com and a leader in Cloud Computing. We work with cutting edge technologies supporting the largest and most innovative businesses, non-profits, and government agencies around the world.

Job Summary

AWS is where innovation, risks, and ideas are celebrated. We are builders, we try new things, and imagine big dreams. It is still Day 1 for us, and we are looking for curious people to be part of our diverse teams of thinkers, testers, and doers. Come join us and work with the latest cloud technologies that enable our customers to adopt cloud-based solutions.

Are you passionate about cloud computing technologies? Can you design unique, cutting-edge solutions that cloud computing architectural best practices? Do you have technical knowledge, business acumen and strong interpersonal skills?

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is seeking a Specialist Solutions Architect to join our Solution Architect Innovation Lab, where you can scale your cloud computer skills and expertise.

Our Associate Solutions Architects are technologists with a demonstrated ability to learn. They are passionate about helping customers build infrastructures and applications at scale using AWS technologies. In this role, you will partner across AWS teams to help customers craft highly scalable, flexible and resilient cloud architectures that address customer business problems. You will shape and deliver replicable technical engagements to help build mind share and broad use of AWS services. As a trusted customer advocate, you will help organizations understand best practices around cloud-based solutions, and how to migrate existing workloads to the cloud.

This is a unique opportunity for driven, self-starters to play a role in a fast-growing business and to deliver significant value to AWS customers. You will have the support to grow your expertise in industry and technology areas of depth. Every day you will be learning something new from your customers, your peers and your own experiments.

Key job responsibilities
 Build a strong foundation of knowledge around AWS cloud services and the cloud ecosystem. Work with customers to explore their business issues and understand how AWS services can help address and resolve these issues. Educate customers on the AWS value proposition and participate in deep architectural discussions to ensure solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloud. Author or contribute to AWS customer-facing publications such as white papers, presentations, demos, and reference architectures. Capture best practices from your customer engagements and share across the AWS Solutions Architect community. Provide consulting support to the customer and Customer service teams, drive complex interactions between the customers, AWS service teams, Customer teams, and third-party partners. Create or otherwise contribute to business cases for Customer projects. Act as a trusted advisor to the customer and a technical liaison between customers, service engineering teams, and partners.
About The Team

Successful candidates will join our WWSO Solution Architect Innovation Lab, where you’ll advance both your technical and business skills and prepare for the Specialist Solution Architect role.


Basic Qualifications
 Proficiency with one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, JavaScript, C#, Java). Experience in at least one technology domain area (e.g., software development, systems engineering, infrastructure, security, networking, data & analytics, edge computing). Understanding of common architectural patterns and design principles. Demonstrated ability to clearly communicate technical concepts verbally and in writing to technical audiences. Background in one or more of the following: Cloud Architecture, Software Development, Embedded Systems, Systems Design. Good written and verbal communication skills. 1-2 years of equivalent experience.
Preferred Qualifications
 Experience working in a customer-facing role. Have worked in technical teams and have relevant software delivery skills. Proficiency in a programming language like C, C++, Java, Node.js, Python. AWS certification (e.g. AWS Solutions Architect Associate or Professional) or other cloud industry certification.

Company - Amazon Web Services Singapore

job_desc:
Job Description:

Get to know our Team:
Internal Audit is an independent function within Grab that provides an objective assurance and advisory role to Grab’s senior management.We use a systematic, disciplined risk-based approach to evaluate and assess Grab’s risks, processes and internal controls.Reflecting Grab’s entrepreneurial spirit, Internal Audit covers multiple businesses and technology areas.
Get to know the Role:
As a Manager of Technology Audit, you are responsible to effectively manage audits and risk advisory activities that cover the associated risks arising from use of Technology activities across Grab’s businesses.You report directly to the Head of Technology Audit & Innovation, and work in a team of technology auditors who are specialised in the audits of Technology and related activities within the Grab’s businesses.We seek a candidate who brings excellent audit and risk advisory experience to complement the Technology Audit team, in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.You effectively plan, manage and execute audits, including the design of audit work steps to evaluate the risks associated with governance, financial, operational, regulatory, and business continuity.
The day-to-day activities:
Support the Head of Technology Audit & Innovation as part of the Technology Audit team.Work with the Technology Audit team and partner the other IA teams, focusing on all risks arising from the Technology activities across Grab’s businesses.Plan and perform risk-based assessments, understand and evaluate the business environment, related technology controls and processes.Prepare draft/ final report and participate in the presentation of audit findings.Develop and maintain business relations with Grab’s management, and be the trusted risk advisor on control related matters.
The must haves:
Bachelor's degree in information systems, computer science/engineering, accountancy, finance or equivalent, with professional certification (e.g., CISA, CISM, CISSP).Specialised experience in auditing applications supporting businesses processes and productsExperienced in auditing cybersecurity domains and/or cloud computing environment will be an added advantage.10-12 years of technology audit and risk advisory (including Sarbanes-Oxley) experience.Strong knowledge of technology regulatory requirements and expectations within South-East Asia.Excellent command of English.Proficiency in productivity tools (email, calendar, Word, Excel, PowerPoint).Located in Singapore, and ability to travel for work when required.
Experience and knowledge in the following:
Excellent technology auditing skills, with strong confidence for interaction with stakeholders.Experience with the use of data analytics and visualisation tools for audit will be an added advantage.

Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.

We are currently looking for an Azure Specialist for our Singapore Public Sector segment to drive our next generation of Cloud projects and increase our Cloud consumaption share in market.

Responsibilities

As an Azure Infrastructure Specialist, you are a senior business leader with deep technical and business expertise within our enterprise sales organization, working with our most important customers. You will lead a virtual team of sales, technical, and services resources to help customers realize the digital transformation through cloud computing. A core competency of the role is to advance the engagement process to achieve/exceed quarterly Azure Infrastructure consumption targets for related workloads in your assigned accounts. You possess a high EQ with executive presence, able to engage with senior decision makers to uncover digital transformation initiatives, and a passion for learning how Azure cloud services can deliver digital transformation. You will develop and maintain an Azure Infrastructure migration and modernization expertise, able to identify projects, build a compelling business case, and drive the consumption project to production. You will build and maintain relationships with customers, influence long-term strategic direction and act as a trusted advisor driving engagement at the CXO level with business and technology decision makers. You will help customers evaluate their cloud strategy, determine approaches to application and data migration and modernization, and recommend solutions that meet their requirements. You will remove roadblocks to deployment and drive customer satisfaction

Qualifications

Professional
Experience. 5-7 years’ experience selling business solutions to large/global enterprise/public sector customers with a focus on application and infrastructure technologies requiredAccount Management. Effective territory/account management: planning, opportunity qualification and creation, stakeholder and executive communication, analysis, value engineering, services/partner engagement, opportunity management, pipeline management requiredExecutive Presence. Experience and expertise selling to senior business decision makers by aligning & reinforcing the value of the solution to the customer’s overall business pain and/or strategic opportunities and decision criteria.Problem Solver. Ability to solve customer problems through cloud technologies requiredBusiness Value. Able to utilize tools such as the Azure Pricing Calculator, Azure ROI Tool, and Azure TCO Tool to generate consumption project cost estimates and demonstrate Cloud economic value to customers Consumption Project Management. Experience leveraging cloud adoption methodologies and frameworks to structure application migration projects preferredCollaborative. Orchestrate and influence virtual teams to pursue sales opportunities and lead v-teams through influence required 
Technical
Azure Platform. Understanding of Microsoft Azure Cloud platform with emphasis on Azure Infrastructure solutions including IaaS and PaaS based environments, and Azure based application management and governance. Understanding and being familiar with Windows Server and Linux Server Licensing model requireTechnical Dialog. Lead technical sessions making use of whiteboards or other resources to drive solution discussions leveraging published solution architectures for common infrastructure implementations requiredTechnical Demonstration. Ability to demonstrate Azure solutions leveraging pre-packaged Azure demo environments and live demos from the Azure Resource Manager showcasing relevant Azure infrastructure solutions requiredTechnical Frameworks. Ability to leverage technical frameworks such as the Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure to guide customers and partners through the cloud adoption journey preferredLeadership. Experience leading large cloud engagements, especially those involving Infrastructure migration and application modernization projects preferredCompetitive Landscape. Knowledge of enterprise software solutions and cloud and datacenter infrastructure competitor landscape including AWS and GCPPartners. Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needsCertifications. Azure certifications (good to have)

job_title: Telecom Data & Analytics Business Development Leader, APJ
job_desc:
Job Summary

DESCRIPTION

Would you like to enable some of the largest telecom operators in the world transform the ways in which they use data for predicting customer needs, preventing inefficiencies and delivering personalized experiences? Have you been a part of creating and delivering digital and analytics strategies for major Telcos?

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a dynamic and rapidly growing business within Amazon and the leader in providing secure, reliable, scalable, and innovative cloud services that help businesses across the globe scale and grow. The AWS Telecom Business Development team is looking for an experienced candidate to lead Data Management and Analytics Go-To-Market, driving significant adoption of data, analytics and AI/ML solutions for our largest telecom customers.

This is a senior role, with an Asia-Pacific remit, to guide customers in accelerating their digital transformations by building data-driven organizations, and enabling business outcomes leveraging AWS’ database, analytics, AI and ML technologies. You will help our telecom customers accelerate this journey by engaging with the customers' business and technology stakeholders to create a compelling vision of a data-driven enterprise in their environment; helping them learn from examples of industry leaders, reference architectures and define what “great” looks like for their data-driven enterprise.

This role may be located in Sydney or Singapore, and will strive to create alignment among customer stakeholders, address resistance to change and provide a tangible, executable vision to transition to a cloud computing model. They will operate effectively at multiple levels of the organization and can address concerns across C-suite executives, marketing/LOB leaders, data science practitioners, and established platform teams.

You will represent the AWS telecom data strategy and be the leading voice for AWS telecom data-focused solutions. You will leverage worldwide programs, campaigns and work closely with the wider AWS business development, product management, marketing, solutions architecture, partner and professional services teams to position the AWS telecom data strategy for telecom customers and partners.

The ideal candidate will possess a telecommunications business- and data analytics background (preferably including machine learning), with a foundation of having directly led sales / pre-sales / consulting engagements and interactions at the highest levels of large telecom operators and technology partners. The candidate should have proven expertise at thought leadership, conceptualizing customer-centric solutions, convincing C-Level executives, line of business leaders and IT architects, and having seen through successful sales to delivery cycles.

Additionally, the ideal candidate will have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and long-term about the needs of complex global businesses. The ideal candidate will also be deeply familiar with complex legacy IT environments, managed enterprise IT infrastructure services, telecom enterprise applications, and has done market analysis, deal negotiation/shaping, with an awareness of field enablement techniques.

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.


Basic Qualifications
 Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or a related field 15+ years of experience in client related interactions, including executive presentations, relationship management, deal structuring and commercials negotiation, including working with partners in a consortium framework 10+ years of related experience in data management and data architecture 3+ years experience in analytics roadmaps, including machine learning Experience managing / advising on data operations, data strategy, data governance, metadata management, or data quality management discipline
Preferred Qualifications
 Masters in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or applicable field, or MBA Experience creating and executing organizational change management strategies as part of a larger transformation Program oversight experience in a Sales / Business Development capacity, including planning, prioritization, successful project completion and maintaining a focus on high standards and quality Experience with machine learning Experience with data architecture, data system and tools, related software, and data management policies and practices in a complex organizational environment Experience in evaluating on-premise vs cloud computing models AWS Cloud certifications
What if I’m not an expert in all the above? That’s okay. We hire people who have a passion for learning, and are curious to build, learn and grow. You will be supported in your career development here at AWS. You will have plenty of opportunities to build your technical, leadership, business and consulting skills. This will include formal and on the job training, and a chance to learn and upskill through AWS certification courses and mentorship. You will learn from and collaborate with some of the brightest technical minds in the industry today. If you want to work with the best cloud technologies from the world’s leading cloud provider, apply now. We can’t wait to see what you build here. Come build the future with AWS.

CULTURE AND COMMITMENT TO INCLUSION, DIVERSITY & EQUITY

At AWS, we welcome all builders. We believe that technology should be built in a way that’s inclusive, accessible, and equitable. We’re committed to putting in the work for more equal representation.

job_desc:
Job Description

Telco Solution Engineer is the leader and primary interface to technologists and key decision-makers to our first-tier communication service provider customers. You will be expected to build relationships with technologist in our customers and strategic partners and develop technical solutions for the Radio Access Network (RAN) and/or Mobile Packet Core.

In this capacity you will lead the development, presentation, and positioning of multi-product solutions for customers in the Telco industry and ensure VMware’s roadmap and strategy meets customer requirements. You will also be responsible for being the ‘voice of the customer’ within the VMware product and development teams.

You are a thought leader driving technical and business requirements with large Mobile and Communications Providers. Youhave worked in the Telco and/or Cloud ecosystem of Vendors and/or Partners to drive end to end strategy for customers.

 This position is part of VMware Future of Work and fully remote. Candidates can be located anywhere in the United States!

Industry Specific Knowledge:

Knowledgeable in 3G/4G and 5G Radio network architecture and ecosystemDetailed understanding of 3GPP packet core domain and specifications as related to 4G EPC and 5G core. Functions: SMF, UPF, AMF, MME, SAEGW, ePDGSubscriber and Policy (PCRF/PCF, AUSF, SDM, HSS, HLR)Knowledgeable in Radio Access Network (RAN) design and RAN virtualization Strong technical knowledge of 3GPP specifications as related to CU and DU and RRU protocol interfacesRAN Technologies (vRAN, Small Cells, MIMO, Timing and Sync with GPS, IEEE 1588v2)Knowledge of O-RAN specs, TIP/OpenRAN projects, and/or ONF SD-RAN.Mobile Private LTE, Small Cell, and Wi-Fi Industry experienceData Center networking, Virtualization, NFV and SDNLayer 1-3 functionalityCloud Native Container orchestration via Kubernetes.MEC and Edge Computing Management and Orchestration (e.g., MANO), Network Management, OSS/BSS, and TM Forum standards

Should also have:

Consultative selling skills Outstanding communication and presentation skillsExperience working with virtual teams in order to develop and deliver customer solutionsCommunications Service Provide domain knowledge

Storage Engineering Data Scientist Intern

Dell Technologies, Client Solutions Group (CSG) creates and sells a full range of PCs and personal devices. We focus on bringing best-in-class technology to the market to enabling Dell to create the next generation of PCs and personal devices for our customers to use at work and home. We are expanding the Storage Engineering team with new capability in Data Analytics to add value to this focus.

The Data Analytics shall help to connect the storage device design attributes, system configuration, telemetry data on SMART (Self-Monitoring Analysis, and Reporting Technology), field/service quality information and extract critical information to assist in optimizing product design. This is to improve the quality and/or enhance product features.

Join us as a Storage Engineering Data Scientist Intern in Singapore to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What You’ll Achieve

As an Intern Undergraduate, you will
Work closely with a cross functional team to determine the data available in their functional organization and find methods to efficiently extract them for analytic purpose.Reach out to other data scientists to discuss the current state of data science applications in Engineering and Supply Chain.Identify opportunities to innovate across the Engineering/Quality teams through data science and analytics.

We seek a data scientist intern with a passion to…
Build a data analytics infrastructure and tools from grounds upLearn and apply database tools and statistical predictive models by analyzing large datasets with a variety of toolsAsk and answer questions in large datasets and have a strong desire to create strategies and solutions that challenge and expand the thinking of everyone around youDeep dive into data to find answers to yet unknown questions and have a natural desire to go beneath the surface of a problemAsk relevant questions and possess the skills to build algorithms necessary to find meaningful answersCreatively visualize and effectively communicate data findings and insights in a variety of formats

Take the first step towards your dream career

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements
Ability to apply data science concepts in an Engineering environmentTheoretical knowledge of statistics and machine learning and application through statistical programming languages (e.g. R, and/or Python)Proficiency in SQLSelf-driven, able to work independently yet acts as a team playerStrong communication skills, willingness to learn and develop their ability to apply data science principles through an Engineering lens

Desirable Requirements
 Ability to communicate well with senior level team members   Collaboration skills Data management  

Our team’s way of working
We want to uncover ways to impact every key decision (in Dell’s Storage Engineering) with a data science solution by experimenting togetherWe use our curiosity to find latent opportunities. We work in an agile methodology and you will have the autonomy to suggest and work on alternative approaches.We target decisions that achieves our company objectives. Our solutions address important prevailing Engineering problems and we continuously keep this in mind while progressing through our projects.We excel when we collaborate. Data scientists are encouraged to seek feedback from others and have open discussions while progressing through the data science lifecycle.

Here’s our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.

You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

job_title: Strategy Consultant - Enterprise & Cloud Transformation/ Migration
job_desc:
472686BR

Introduction

As a Strategy Consultant at IBM, you will help reinvent businesses and industries by developing and utilizing specialized knowledge of industry-specific and cross-industry competitive strategies. You'll manage complex components of an engagement, working closely with clients and their customers to understand their pain points. Your strategic recommendations will drive change in a digitally-enabled era and give you the opportunity to collaborate with highly talented IBMers.

Your Role and Responsibilities

Your Role And Responsibilities

The Global Business Services Cloud Center of Competency is a Leader in Cloud solutions. We are seeking applications for Strategy Consultant- Enterprise & Cloud Transformation/ Migration position to join our team. The role is meant for highly talented personnel to help accelerate our journey in Enterprise Cloud Transformation space.

Specializing in Cloud Migration Services, you will lead technical planning and activities of data center and cloud migration, rehosting, re-platforming and ensure that design and technical deliverables align with recommended practices. You will develop migration patterns and approaches, collaborate with client senior executives, utilized best practices, reference architecture, and assets to develop migration solutions.

In this role, you will advise our clients on the enterprise transformation and complex modernizations of their applications for cloud and lead our clients in cloud adoption journey. The role requires the ability to work with the client's IT team, as well as C-level executives to demonstrate the cloud value proposition. This includes assessing the current application and infrastructure environment, performing a gap analysis, and recommending the to-be application solution architecture along with business case / economic model., you will be required to represent deep expertise on migration of applications currently running on mainframes or traditional Java environments, transformation of mission critical applications needing re-architecture that goes beyond containerization or refactoring. You will use your knowledge of complex application architecture, legacy applications and other platforms as a service offering in the market, cloud application architecture and best practices, API management, Microservices, DevOps, and cloud integration suites to advise our clients on their hybrid cloud journey and multi-speed IT. We are seeking a candidate who is able to design, architect and modernize legacy applications. Ability to work with and lead a global team and flexibility will be essential. As a Strategy Consultant, you directly help clients transform their business and solve complex problems. You will define the scope and vision for projects that deliver customized solutions using your knowledge of IBM platforms. You are a technical leader, serving as a liaison among business partners, technical resources, and project stakeholders.

Required Technical And Professional Expertise

15+ years of overall relevant IT experience in complex Enterprise Transformation including transformation to Cloud and Digital5+ years of consultative solution design and advising senior client executives as trusted advisors helping to transform enterprises5 + years of experience in Migrate On-premise database to Public Cloud DB environment, PaaS DB. Performance Tuning & Capacity Monitoring. Data Security, Backup & Recovery. Standby/Failover Administration5 years of experience with legacy applications5 years of experience architecting and developing cloud application solutions, on RedHat OpenShift Platforms for cloud native architecture and deployment models will be added advantage.Experience leading one or more of the following areas of a Cloud transformation journey: strategy, design, application migration planning and implementation, Consultative-based selling of technology transformation projectsDeep understanding of Cloud Security and Compliance, risk evaluation. Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise6 years of experience with mainframe applications, Java application development, API and Microservices frameworks and Container Execution and Orchestration PlatformsKnowledge on VMware is preferred8 years of experience consulting, experience in design cloud strategy operating model and developing business case for the clientDeep understanding of Open-source middleware and integration capabilities to accelerate Open InnovationAt least 5+ years of experience coding in Java, Python, Ruby, Go, and Javascript frameworks, containerization and container management, architecting and developing cloud applications and DevSecOps and Continuous Integration Continuous Deployment3+ years of experience in Cloud Service Management, DevSecOps methodologies, Site Reliability Engineering, Establish Application SREs for modernized application workloads.Very strong leadership and communication skills exhibiting right negotiating posture with customer and program teams to make the right decisions.Experience in delivering application transformation projects for Java and legacy applications, developing project plans and budgets for successful information technology projects, documenting and presenting recommendations to clients and/or stakeholders

About JumpCloud

JumpCloud’s mission is to Make Work Happen®, providing simple, secure access to corporate technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Directory Platform gives IT, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities, their devices, and apply conditional access controls based on Zero Trust principals. Since launching in 2012, our global user base has grown to more than 150,000 organizations, with more than 5,000 paying customers including Cars.com, GoFundMe, Grab, ClassPass, Uplight and Peloton. JumpCloud has raised over $400M from world-class investors including Sapphire Ventures, General Atlantic, Sands Capital, Atlassian, and CrowdStrike. Our teams are growing fast, too, and we're looking for talent across engineering, sales, customer success, marketing, product management, and more. Join our team of dedicated, passionate, and creative people who are eager to change the IT industry forever.

The Pre-Sales Engineering team is rapidly expanding to support our sales functions and equip our salespeople with the technical resources they need to help drive revenue growth. The Pre-Sales Engineering team is responsible for providing technical expertise and consulting to organizations during their evaluation and to help show the value of JumpCloud solutions.

What You’ll Be Doing
Acting as the technical trusted advisor to provide consultative support for organizations across the APAC region evaluating the JumpCloud platformProviding tailored product demonstrationsUncovering customer pain points and challenges and aligning JumpCloud solutions to those challengesSupport direct and partner sales teams with product related questions and skill developmentBuilding relationships with partners through technical enablement and co-sellingAssist prospects with setup and configuration of free trialsProvide technical Q&A to prospects as they progress through trialAssess prospect readiness to enter a formal sales cycleUnderstand implementation best practices to advise on the quickest customer time to valueIdentify common technical issues and themes that could be addressed through product development, automation and/or self-serveProvide evaluation framework for prospects to follow in their POC
We’re Looking For
Excellent written and verbal English communications skillsAbility to make the complex simpleComfortable speaking with technical evaluators and IT leaders, and adjusting talk-track to match the audienceDesire and ability to learn new complex conceptsMust be located in and authorized to work in this country without visa sponsorship.

3-5 years experience in a technical Sales Engineering or similar role Strong knowledge of Cloud/SaaS technologiesStrong understanding of Active Directory environmentsUnderstanding of network architectureKnowledgeable in industry standard authentication and authorization protocols e.g. SAML, OIDC/OAuth, LDAP, RADIUSFamiliarity with MDM, RMM, or similar endpoint solutionsFamiliarity with MFA technologies such as TOTP, WebAuthnExperience configuring and deploying identity and/or directory solutionsExperience with both direct and channel/partner sales cycles
This role is fully remote in Asia. You must be located in and authorized to work in Asia to be considered for this role. 

Where you’ll be working/Location:

You must currently live in and be authorized to work in Singapore without sponsorship to be considered for this role.

Why JumpCloud? 

If you thrive working in a fast, SaaS-based environment and you are passionate about solving challenging technical problems, we look forward to hearing from you! JumpCloud is an incredible place to share and grow your expertise! You’ll work with amazing talent across each department who are passionate about our mission. We’re out of the box thinkers, so your unique ideas and approaches for conceiving a product and/or feature will be welcome. Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

We are looking for:

Business and Integration Architect to join our Salesforce Business Group with the focus on Salesforce projects. You will become part of the Global Salesforce Business Group practice and you will be working on a project basis in a multi-disciplinary team engaged in a wide range of Salesforce projects.

Responsibilities:

Provide a leadership role for Accounts, can lead Lifesciences salesforce organization on a continuous journey of sustained improvement. 

Responsible for shaping client solutions, including developing the strategy, business case and driving the technical solution involving intelligent automation solutions

Accountable for ensuring that the projects or programs adhere to Sustainable outcomes

Understand business drivers that will impact performance

Ensure communication from/ to the project team and client of any issues that may affect any areas of the project

Be involved in setting strategic direction to establish near term goals for area of responsibility.

Interact with leadership and senior management levels at a client and/or within Accenture, which involves negotiating or influencing on significant matters.

Manage large teams and/or work efforts. Conduct project and issue management (status reporting, issue reporting, ETC/budget reporting) for assigned scope of work.

Design solution (Automation & Process improvements) that are modular and can be replicated and look for replication opportunities for solution being developed.

Requirement:

12 to 15 years experience in Salesforce delivery manage and business analysis

Strong expertise in Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Health Cloud, Marketing Cloud, and Community Cloud. Health cloud and Community cloud expertise is a MUST

Minimum certifications expected – Sales cloud consultant, Service cloud consultant, Community cloud consultant. Health cloud is a plus

Ability to engage with senior clients in a business centric, business outcome-oriented dialogue

Ability to articulate the relevant platform value proposition

Customer oriented and great at building client relationships

Desire to work in a dynamic work environment and be creative within a team

Proven ability to build, manage and foster a team-oriented environment

Proven ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment

Desire to work in an information systems environment

Excellent communication (written and oral), presentation skills, interpersonal skills, and management skills

Why join us?

You will also have opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. We offer a variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster. Learning takes place both on the job and through formal training conducted online, in the classroom, or in collaboration with teammates. Introduction

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities

At IBM, we believe in putting smart to work. In applying technologies to solve some of the biggest challenges benefiting individuals, businesses and the world. At the core, it means building a talented team of specialists to deliver innovative solutions with IBM technologies. Our internship program is aimed at identifying and developing talent from an early stage to create a pipeline of top tiered candidates to join IBM in full time roles.

IBM Singapore is looking for candidates in the fields of computer science, engineering and mathematic to join our Data, AI and Automation team for a 5-month internship. The Data, AI and Automation team is the heart of our strategy to leverage AI and Hybrid Cloud to create a competitive edge for our clients. If selected, you will be working with and learning from team of multi-disciplinary technology experts. Working with other interns in the program, you will have the opportunity to create prototypes that solves real world business problem for some of the largest companies in Asia Pacific using IBM technologies. We intend to provide an environment to foster creativity where you can take ownership of the solution that you are building. If working in one of the top tech companies and exercising your skills and creativity sounds exciting to you, then you may be the candidate that we are looking for.

The selected candidate will work together with fellow interns in a project to create a compelling MVP to show case IBM technologies. With one of the largest software portfolio in the IT industry, the team will be able to leverage a wide range of capabilities in Data, AI, Hybrid Cloud and Automation. The intern team will be working closely with one of more project advisor(s) to define the project scope, design and implement the MVP to show case relevant business values. This internship is designed for candidates to expand their technical knowledge, work with experts from IBM and exercise their creativity. If you looking for a typical internship with restrictive tasks and deliverables, this one may not be for you. However, if you are looking to take ownership of your project and work on interesting problems to impress top corporations in the region, this one is definitely for you.

Your Role And Responsibilities

Learn about the latest technologies and industry trends for AI Operations, Site Reliability Engineering, Robotic Process Automation, DevOps and more Work with your mentor to define the project scopeLearn about best methodology like Design Thinking and Agile Development, then put them into practiceWork in a team with the fellow intern(s) to create solutionManage a development project with a tight time lineAnd have fun!

These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients’ growth and innovation. Product Management Senior Advisor

Showcasing excellence and innovation at every stage, Product Management is responsible for the cross-functional management of products or solutions through their entire lifecycle. Using a wealth of technical and industry experience, we work across functional areas to implement our products or solutions. We undertake thorough analysis of the markets to ensure we maximize profitability and adjust our product strategies to respond to competition. Our role also involves acting as subject matter experts for internal and external product events or partner meetings.

Join us as a Product Management, Senior Advisor on our Product Management team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

What You’ll Achieve

As a Product Management Senior Advisor, you will identify new growth areas, technologies and emerging product/service opportunities. You will conduct in-depth market analysis to optimize existing products/solutions and build next generation products, partnering closely with the Engineering and Product Management teams to build a product road map and align product strategies for the business.

You will:
You will create and own Dell Monitor Arms/Stands product roadmaps; to define and conceptualize next gen experiences for our customers across the globe.Require a deep pulse on what matters for Monitor Arms/Stands, and how to relate and stay relevant in a rapidly evolving industry.Need to effectively translate the nuanced voice and needs of our customers into experiences that underpin our clear product value propositionBe the product evangelist; product subject matter expert in the room for all our stakeholders (e.g. support functions, regional sales and go to market teams)Work closely alongside Client system teams to deliver a unique ecosystem experience for our customersEngagement across segments/geographies to effectively develop product positioning, strategy, taking into close account regional and market requirements.Develop & present issues/updates & proposals to executive managementManage products throughout their entire lifecycle

Take the first step towards your dream career

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:

Essential Requirements
Excellent technology/engineering skills relating to design, test and qualitySolid grasp of business goals and objectives as they relate to customer use cases and solutionsExcellence in understanding competitors and their products as well as potential partner relationships for the product

Desirable Requirements

Here’s our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.

You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

job_desc:
Acronis is dedicated not just to cyber protection but to the general protection of its potential and current employees, interviews are being held virtually during the current global COVID-19 situation. 

Acronis is a world leader in cyber protection—empowering people by providing them with cutting-edge technology that enables them to monitor, control, and protect the data that their businesses and lives depend on. We are in an exciting phase of growth and expansion and looking for a Cloud Partner Success Manager (PSM) who is ready to join us in creating a #CyberFit future and protecting the digital world!

As the Cloud Partner Success Manager you will bring experience in Account Management and have a passion for Data Protection and Cyber Security. You will work as part of the Inside Sales Channel Management organization and aligned with a portfolio of service providers utilizing Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud. Your main goals as the Cloud PSM will be to drive drive Annual Recurrent Revenue growth through account planning with dedicated partners, increase adoption of new services, retain a partner and create a best in class partner experience which is the key differentiator of Acronis.

Like every member of our “A-Team”, the Cloud PSM has an instrumental role and impact on the success of Acronis’ innovative and growing business, so we are looking for a highly-motivated individual with a positive attitude who thrives in a fast-paced, rapidly-changing and global work environment.

What You'll Do
Make a territory analysis and planning for dedicated geographies to identify top potential partners.Align with Acronis Cloud Distributors for joint activities for channel enablementActivate and enable new partners with Acronis sales and marketing tools and programsDrive successful upsell \ cross sell initiatives so partnerMake partners sell Acronis services to existing customer base of the partner, attract new customers to partner and help to retain existing customer to partnerTrain new partners with existing and new productsDevelop relationship with key decision makers on partner sideSupport new partners on daily basis on business and technology developmentEngage Acronis presales and Technical support teamsKey KPIs: Total Revenue from signed partners, churn rate (% of partners leaving the program), number of Acronis services sold through the partner
What You Bring (experience & Qualifications)
Equivalent industry experienceChannel sales\ Partner account manager \ Channel development position within a software vendor, with a minimum of 5+ years sales and marketing experience in the software industryIn depth channel and field sales experience with understanding of cloud market business modelStrong presentation, communication and planning skillsNative/fluent English + any local language
Who We Are

Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by integrating backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution. This all-in-one integration removes the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions and offers easy, complete and reliable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environment—physical, virtual, cloud, and mobile—all at a low cost.

Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis is truly a global organization with more than 1,900 employees in 33 locations in 18 countries. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million consumers and 500,000 businesses, including 100% of the Fortune 1000 companies. Acronis products are available through 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries in more than 30 languages. Acronis is in an exciting phase of growth and expansion, recently receiving a $250 million investment from CVC Capital Partners, bringing the total valuation to more than $2.5 billion.

Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. Introduction

As a Package Consultant at IBM, get ready to tackle numerous mission-critical company directives. Our team takes on the challenge of designing, developing and re-engineering highly complex application components and integrating software packages using various tools. You will use a mix of consultative skills, business knowledge, and technical expertise to effectively integrate packaged technology into our clients' business environment and achieve business results.

Your Role and Responsibilities

As an experienced SAP Consultant at IBM Global Business Services, you will deliver innovative business solutions through design, build and test, including responsibility for and systems integration. You will leverage your subject matter expertise and your leadership capabilities to ensure successful project delivery and client success. We will give you access to unique career opportunities, and a vast and diverse network of talented SAP professionals. As a leader within our SAP practice you will get the chance to participate in new and existing implementations, developed with the latest technology and tools. At IBM you’ll find your role has a unique look, combining both strong technical and business skills. SAP solution architects serve as the conduit between businesses and technology. In general, they oversee all aspects of a systems solution, including those that are targeted towards customer relations, human resources, product life cycles and supply chains. Using their analytical and problem-solving skills, SAP solutions architects craft adaptable, comprehensive suites appropriate for each client. Converting large segments of a company's software can be a major undertaking, and SAP solution architects must design and implement the process in stages, to ensure a smooth transition.

The IA CoE is accountable for delivering IA strategy that aligns and forms part of the broader Dyson IT blueprint. job_title: Cloud Network Engineer, Physical Network Infrastructure
job_desc:
Founded in 2012, ByteDance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Helo, and Resso, as well as platforms specific to the China market, including Toutiao, Douyin, and Xigua, ByteDance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content.

ByteDance Networking brings together innovative ideas and technologies from network architecture, software-defined networking (SDN), network virtualization, switch software and hardware co-design, and high-speed networking, to create hyperscale data-center networking solutions that power several of the most popular apps of the world such as Douyin and TikTok which serve hundreds of millions of users around the globe.

ByteDance Networking is responsible for designing, building, and operating the global, intelligent network infrastructure to meet the requirements of high availability, scalability, and high-performance. By joining this team, you will gain marketable software development and/or network operation experiences in data center networking on a massive scale.

We are seeking a Cloud Network Engineer to join our network engineering team based in Singapore. You'll be part of Bytedance global network infrastructure team and focus more on public cloud technologies. Building and operating our public cloud network infrastructure, brings satisfaction to both internal and external customers.

Responsibilities
 Responsible for building, delivery and daily operation of ByteDance's public cloud infrastructure Responsible for high level and low level design, road-map and standardization of ByteDance's public cloud infrastructure Responsible for automation and cloud architecture optimization Drive to improve satisfaction for both internal and external customers As a team member, support ByteDance's global network infrastructure operations - Expert knowledge of TCP/IP, routing protocols, such as ISIS, BGP, overlay technologies such as Vxlan, familiar with hyper-scale datacenter and backbone architecture Familiar with Linux system and virtualization technologies, such as kvm, xen, hyper-v, lxc, etc. Rich hands and troubleshooting experiences, especially in a complex environment Self-motivated, good communication and written skills. Team player and participate in Bytedance network global on call rotation. Candidate with public cloud building & operations experience is preferred.

Required
 Interested in being a part of a fast-paced sales environment Team player with excellent oral and written communication Exceptional organisational and planning skills and ability to prioritize Proactive Target driven Experience with Excel and LinkedIn Sales Navigator Experience using/cleaning external sources of data such as Hoovers and OneSource to validate company information and add new companies Able to liaise fluently in Mandarin and Cantonese Able to start asap. job_title: Telecom BSS/OSS Business Development Leader, ASEAN
job_desc:
Job Summary

DESCRIPTION

Would you like to enable transformations at some of the largest telecom operators in the world? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a dynamic and rapidly growing business within Amazon and the leader in providing secure, reliable, scalable, and innovative cloud services that help businesses across the globe scale and grow. The AWS Telecom Business Development team is looking for a seasoned Telecom industry leader with experience in advising, winning and delivering innovative network transformation solutions for Telecom service providers.

This is a senior role within the Asia-Pacific & Japan (APJ) team, to guide customers in accelerating their digital transformations by building networks that leverage a software-based architecture, and enabling business outcomes leveraging AWS’ telecom-supportive technologies. You will help our telecom customers accelerate this journey by engaging with the customers' business and technology stakeholders to create a compelling vision AWS services in their environment; helping them learn from examples of industry leaders, reference architectures and define what “great” looks like for their enterprise.

This role may be located in Singapore, Jakarta, Kuala Lumpur or Manila, and will strive to create alignment among customer stakeholders, address resistance to change and provide a tangible, executable vision to transition to a cloud computing model. This leader will operate effectively at multiple levels of the organization and can address concerns across C-suite executives, IT/Network/Procurement leaders and established platform teams.

Areas Of Expertise Will Include Most Of The Following
 In-depth understanding across Telecommunications systems, standards & processes Granular understanding of the economics of network operations including BSS/OSS considerations and Telco IT strategy Deep familiarity with OSS, Multi-Mediation, Multi-Activation, Service Orchestration, offline and online Billing, Order management and customer experience management domains. Firm grasp of Network Function Virtualization (NFV) and various Virtual Network Function (VNF) technologies Executive level network transformation proposal structuring, presentation & negotiation, including in consortiums with partners
You will represent the AWS telecom strategy and be the leading voice for AWS telecom-focused solutions. You will leverage worldwide programs, campaigns and work closely with the wider AWS business development, product management, marketing, solutions architecture, partner and professional services teams to position the AWS telecom data strategy for telecom customers and partners.

Responsibilities Will Include
 Providing business transformation and digital technology adoption thought leadership to Telecom customers & partners Conducting C-level executive workshops; engaging and leading strategic discussions with senior telecom industry leaders regarding networks transformation Helping Telcos identify transformational opportunities and driving adoption of AWS solutions Identifying and scoping high impact transformation solutions with measurable business results for our customers Drive lighthouse OSS and BSS transformations leveraging cloud infrastructure and operating principles Work with multiple sales and technical teams within AWS and global technology solution providers for OSS and BSS applications to define and execute GTM initiatives. Engage each technology solution provider’s field sales organizations, channels and end customers to create and drive revenue opportunities for AWS. Ensure that there is a strategic business development plan for target markets, aligned with AWS’ strategic direction. Inventing and delivering new offers, collaborating with AWS professional services, service teams, partners, and Amazon product teams Providing telco thought leadership by participating in industry conferences and executive briefings Supporting client engagements within the assigned territory and influencing activities at our Geo Accounts Supporting our AWS Partner Network and key industry ISVs with their Telco solutions on AWS
The ideal candidate will possess a foundation of having directly led sales / pre-sales / consulting engagements and interactions at the highest levels of large telecom operators and technology partners. The candidate should have proven expertise at thought leadership, conceptualizing customer-centric solutions, convincing C-Level executives, CIOs/CTOs & line of business leaders and IT architects, and having seen through successful sales to delivery cycles.

Additionally, the ideal candidate will have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and long-term about the needs of complex global telecom businesses. The ideal candidate will also be deeply familiar with complex legacy IT environments, managed enterprise IT infrastructure services, telecom enterprise applications, and has done market analysis, deal negotiation/shaping, with an awareness of field enablement techniques.


Basic Qualifications
 Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or a related field 15+ years of experience in client related interactions, including executive presentations, relationship management, deal structuring and commercials negotiation, including working with partners in a consortium framework Strong understanding of Telco IT and digital transformation, including the role of cloud, data strategy, AI/ML Demonstrated ability and track record leading Telco sales growth within a cross-functional team (direct reporting and virtual), in complex client engagements Track record of building rapport with senior partner and customer executives (e.g. CEO, CIO, CTO), building close relationships, and closing large revenue accounts. 7+ years experience with $100M+ deals in the Telco sector in sales or business development capacity Demonstrated experience designing winning proposals to address the re-architecture of legacy BSS/OSS platforms to be run on public cloud.
Preferred Qualifications
 Telco industry Business and Technical expertise across IT, OSS/BSS architectures and workloads, including ERP, CRM, Billing, Charging, Order Management, Catalogue Management, Mediation, Provisioning, Activation, Inventory Management, Service Assurance, Fault & Performance Management, Data Warehousing, Decision Support System, EAI/ESB Solutions Masters in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or applicable field, or MBA Experience creating and executing organizational change management strategies as part of a larger transformation Program oversight experience in a Sales / Business Development capacity, including planning, prioritization, successful project completion and maintaining a focus on high standards and quality across own organization and partners Experience in evaluating on-premise vs cloud computing models
What if I’m not an expert in all the above? That’s okay. We hire people who have a passion for learning, and are curious to build, learn and grow. You will be supported in your career development here at AWS. You will have plenty of opportunities to build your technical, leadership, business and consulting skills. This will include formal and on the job training, and a chance to learn and upskill through AWS certification courses and mentorship. You will learn from and collaborate with some of the brightest technical minds in the industry today. If you want to work with the best cloud technologies from the world’s leading cloud provider, apply now. We can’t wait to see what you build here. Come build the future with AWS.

CULTURE AND COMMITMENT TO INCLUSION, DIVERSITY & EQUITY

At AWS, we welcome all builders. We believe that technology should be built in a way that’s inclusive, accessible, and equitable. We’re committed to putting in the work for more equal representation.

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

job_desc:
Company Overview

Our client is one of Singapore’s largest shipping container firm. It currently holds the position of top 20 largest operator by capacity according to the Top 100 ranking for 2021 published by the maritime portal Alphaliner.

Our client feeds trans-shipment hubs and ports throughout the world . As part of the hiring strategy for 2022 to move on-prem infrastructure to cloud platform, our client is looking to hire IT Security Engineer. This role reports to Assistant Manager Security. The main responsibilities revolve around 3 main pillars: IT Security Management, IT Security Project and IT Governance.

Job Responsibilities
 Perform investigations of Security incidents;  Perform threat hunting using SIEM and SOAR tools.  Participate in internal and external IT audits;  Maintain Incident Response Plans and IT policies;  Perform Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing;  Conduct Security awareness training for the organization;  Conduct phishing campaigns  Design and review IT/Cyber security architectures;  Works with external parties (eg; CSA, MPA) on latest cyber threats and trends;  Assist in vessel IT security setup, review, audit and remedial actions.  Manages Security related projects;  Acts as Security Advisory for all projects;  Participate in RFP and RFQ process 
  JOB REQUIREMENTS 
 Degree in Information Security, Computer Science or related disciplines with at least 3 years of relevant experience;  Knowledgeable in IT Security, Cloud Security, and security standards such as NIST, ISO 27000 and IMO;  IT Security Management experience of various aspect, e.g. network security, server security, application security, end point security, email security, physical access security, logical access security, etc will be an advantage;  Knowledge managing network security devices (NextGen Firewalls, IDS, IPS, UTM, NAC, AV, etc.),  Windows, Linux, and networking service will be an advantage;  Professional certifications (CISSP, CISM, CISA, CEH certified, etc.) will be an advantage;  Knowledge on Cloud Computing (Azure or AWS) will be an added advantage;  Knowledge on Vessel IT will be an advantage. 
 Working Location: Singapore

Apply online or feel free to contact me directly (via email:sarah.chin@jac-recruitment.com) for more information about this opportunity. Due to the high volume of applicants, we regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for your understanding.

Sarah Chin (R 1655546)

JAC Recruitment Pte Ltd (EA Lic No: 90C3026)

job_title: S/4HANA Public Cloud Solution Advisor Expert - South East Asia
job_desc:
What We Offer

Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

Mission

The S/4HANA Public Cloud Solution Advisor Expert will be an integral part of the APJ S/4HANA Center of Excellence (CoE) and will be dedicated to South East Asia. It is a highly visible business development role responsible to evangelize and scale the S/4HANA Public Cloud business across the region. The selected candidate will be expected to engage customers, internal stakeholders, and the partner ecosystem, driving key change management activities focused on demand generation and pipeline qualification excellence to ensure successful opportunities, customer references, and increased revenues aligned to the Public Cloud target customer profile. To act as the digital transformation navigator and trusted advisor for C-Level executives and Functional business leaders by enabling them to ‘Re-Imagine’ their existing businesses as Digital. Enrolling them in a ‘case for change’ for a digital future with SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud as the Digital Core at its heart.

Responsibilities
Leads the GTM strategy, Demand Management and Pipeline Coverage for S/4HANA Public Cloud business in SEAAct as an Executive Advocate for SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud deals and help the Industry Account Executives and extended VAT teams successfully drive the sales cyclesResponsible for building and accelerating a high quality S/4HANA Public Cloud pipeline through programmatic execution of 1:1 and 1:many demand generation campaignsClosely work with ICA Presales, Partner Organization and other VAT team members to programmatically progress key S/4HANA Public Cloud deals through various key milestones like Digital Discovery, Brand Guardian etc.Build and roll out high impact internal and external enablement plans for incubating and scaling S/4HANA Public cloud within the region Collaborate with regional and global Public Cloud Tiger Team to support the Public Cloud Acceleration Program in APJ Foster a strong conduit between the VAT team / customer accounts and development on key LoB / industry functionality needsContribute to go-to-market plan for solutions, drive adoption and review solution success & analysis of customer insight
Goals
Drive pipeline and contribute to budgeted revenue attainment for SAP S/4HANA Public CloudContribute to increased references / customer stories & renewals for SAP S/4HANA Public CloudIncrease target profile (e.g., Mid-Market, Professional Services, Public Sector) net new names adoption of SAP S/4HANA (Public) CloudEvangelize our RISE with SAP Value Proposition both internally and externallyContribute to a culture the exemplifies our “how we run” culture (Build Bridges not Silos, Embrace Differences, Stay Curious, and Tell it Like it Is)
Experience (Role Requirements)
12+ years’ experience in Pre-sales, Solution Sales or Consulting, or related areas preferred5+ years’ experience of SAP ERP, S/4HANA preferably S/4HANA Public Cloud, Business value driven and consultative selling expertise in leading technology and/or consulting firmsPublic cloud mindset ideally with experience in selling and/or positioning public cloud solutionsStrong program management skillsAbility to influenceChange agent (move to business outcome based selling motion, sell to the business not IT)Lead without authoritySharing best practicesContribute to account strategy / development of sales cycleStrong presentation skillsIntellectual curiosity (ability to stay current ...stay at the cutting edge)Thought leadership and act trusted advisor
We are SAP

SAP innovations help more than 400,000 customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with 200 million users and more than 100,000 employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, we build breakthroughs, together.

Our inclusion promise 

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.

Introduction

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities

Join and contribute to our supply chain resiliency initiative to improve real-time assessment and decision making capability. Enable stakeholders proactively anticipate and respond to disruptive events.

ResponsibilitiesIdentify and understand various data sources and support in data collection i.e. supplier, customer, market dataIntegrate data from various sources into standardized formats for purpose of analysisBuild descriptive and predictive analysis and enable supply chain resiliency investigationDescriptive analysis: build IBM Supply Chain resiliency metricsPredictive analysis: design models to predict supply chain resiliencyAutomate analysis process and put in place a routine schedule for analysisMaintain documentation of work
